displayName.text: Mommy Makeover Plastic Surgeons of NYC

formattedAddress: 5 E 57th St #16B, New York, NY 10022, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Mommy Makeover Plastic Surgeons of NYC

adrFormatAddress: 5 E 57th St #16B, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: I had the most amazing experience with a breast reduction by Dr. Mahmood. The entire office staff are so helpful, kind and genuine. The process was as easy as can be but also as informative. My results and healing have been amazing and I deeply trust the team here for care. I am genuinely so pleased with my results and will continue seeing Dr. Mahmood and Hertz for any upcoming cosmetic procedures. The office is super centrally located and super chic, it’s always a pleasure to go to my post op visits. The surgery itself was succesful and that’s to say the least. The process couldn’t have been more seamless. Thank you to the team and staff for making this life changing surgery a positive experience.

originalText.text: Dr. Mahmood changed my life with just one surgery. Her work goes beyond the cosmetic and surface level results and she is truly the best in her field. She and her team went above and beyond to make sure I felt comfortable and informed and the results were even better than I expected (seriously!!). 12/10 recommend for all things cosmetic, anti-aging, and confidence boosting :)

text.text: Dr. Mahmood changed my life with just one surgery. Her work goes beyond the cosmetic and surface level results and she is truly the best in her field. She and her team went above and beyond to make sure I felt comfortable and informed and the results were even better than I expected (seriously!!). 12/10 recommend for all things cosmetic, anti-aging, and confidence boosting :)

originalText.text: I am sincerely grateful for Dr. Mahmood. Words can't express the depth of my appreciation for how she transformed my life. Both she and her team demonstrated unparalleled care and professionalism, leaving a lasting impact on me. Dr. Mahmood's attention to detail and thoroughness are truly remarkable. Initially seeking a breast reduction, I emerged not just with a new chest but with restored confidence to wear clothes I never thought possible and feel at ease in my own skin. The surgical team, alongside a special mention to Maggie, supported me at every step, even responding to my texts at all hours. Thank you so much. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Mahmood.

The surgical team, alongside a special mention to Maggie, supported me at every step, even responding to my texts at all hours. Thank you so much. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Mahmood.

originalText.text: My wife had surgery with Dr. Mahmood  She had a mommy makeover and having 3 kids she was insecure of her body. Dr. Mahmood did a breast lift with implants and a tummy tuck. My wife has the confidence that she had before our beautiful children. We recommend Dr. Mahmood and her amazing staff!

text.text: My wife had surgery with Dr. Mahmood  She had a mommy makeover and having 3 kids she was insecure of her body. Dr. Mahmood did a breast lift with implants and a tummy tuck. My wife has the confidence that she had before our beautiful children. We recommend Dr. Mahmood and her amazing staff!

originalText.text: Dr. Mahmood is the best! She is so talented in her work, she is honest and listens to your goals. She’s easy to talk to and is genuinely a good person. I have recommended her to family and friends because I know they will be in good hands. Dr. Mahmood’s team is amazing as well- Lavinia was there for every question, the anesthesiologist was great, I really can’t say enough great things- they all just took really great care of me. I am so grateful to have found Dr. Mahmood and her amazing team because they really helped restore my confidence!
